m_DescList: INI files are text files used for storing configuration information.
They generally consist of multiple sections and key-value pairs.
When the first visible character of a line is <color=#3c3cff>;</color> or <color=#3c3cff>#</color>, the entire remaining content of that line is considered a comment.
For example, <color=#3c3cff># this is a comment</color> is a comment line.
The goal is to match comment lines with the following conventions:
1. Each test case contains exactly 1 line (no \n)
2. If the line is a comment, match its entire content
3. Line beginnings may contain zero or more whitespace characters
Construct a regular expression to pass all test cases on the right.
